Class BinaryTree<E>

java.lang.Object
BinaryTree<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinarySearchTree
public class BinaryTree<E> extends Object implements Serializable
Class for a binary tree that stores type E objects.
See Also:

    • readBinaryTree

      public static BinaryTree<String> readBinaryTree(BufferedReader bR) throws IOException
      Method to read a binary tree. pre: The input consists of a preorder traversal of the binary tree. The line "null" indicates a null tree.
      Parameters:
      bR - The input file
      Returns:
      The binary tree
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an input error
